articles.title: SNL host Shane Gillis tells audience not to Google why he was fired in 2019 - The Washington Post
articles.description: Gillis hosted “Saturday Night Live” five years after he was dropped from the show for previous anti-Asian and homophobic comments.

articles.title: Death of beloved New York City owl, Flaco, in apparent building collision devastates legions of fans - The Associated Press
